abstract.p: Young American furniture designers are earning notice for their playful pieces; book American Contemporary Furniture offers first survey of these designers; photo (Currents column) (S)

block.p: Young American furniture designers are earning notice for their playful pieces. ''American Contemporary Furniture'' (Universe, $50) offers the first survey of those designers, including Constantin and Laurene Leon Boym (the Strap Chair, above center) and Rodney Allen Trice (the Luggage End Table, above). What they share is a desire to make affordable, fun objects. ''Nobody wants to lug heirloom bureaus around anymore,'' said Cathy Lang Ho, co-author of the book with Marisa Bartolucci.
